org.apache.tomcat.util.http

Class FastHttpDateFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tomcat.util.http.FastHttpDateFormat

  • public final class FastHttpDateFormat
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to generate HTTP dates.
    Author:
    Remy Maucherat

public static final long parseDate(java.lang.String value,

        Deprecated. Unused. This will be removed in Tomcat 10 Use parseDate(String)
        Try to parse the given date as a HTTP date.
        Parameters:
        value - The HTTP date
        threadLocalformats - Ignored. The local array of ConcurrentDateFormat will always be used.
        Returns:
        the date as a long

      • parseDate

        public static final long parseDate(java.lang.String value)
        Try to parse the given date as a HTTP date.
        Parameters:
        value - The HTTP date
        Returns:
        the date as a long or -1 if the value cannot be parsed
